rewards.title: Push Code and Get Rewarded
rewards.description: We believe in rewarding active builders in the Movement ecosystem. Every month, developers who contribute meaningful code, deploy projects, or create innovative applications are eligible for premium Replit accounts and other exclusive benefits.
benefits: Monthly Replit Premium accounts for active developers
Early access to new Movement features and tools
Direct support from the Movement DevRel team
rewards.eligibility: Build and deploy on Movement Network, contribute to ecosystem projects, or create educational content to qualify.

hackathons.title: Battle of Olympus
hackathons.description: The ultimate Move developer competition. Build the next generation of blockchain applications and compete for substantial prizes.

hackathons.title: Mainnet Mania
hackathons.description: Celebrate Movement Mainnet launch by building production-ready applications. Deploy to mainnet and win big.

communityEvents.title: Move Builder Workshop Series
communityEvents.description: Weekly hands-on workshops covering Move fundamentals, advanced patterns, and real-world application development.

communityEvents.title: Developer Office Hours
communityEvents.description: Get your questions answered by the Movement core team. Bring your bugs, ideas, and architectural questions.

communityEvents.title: Monthly Demo Day
communityEvents.description: Showcase your projects to the Movement community. Get feedback, find collaborators, and win community awards.

communityEvents.title: Move Language Deep Dive
communityEvents.description: Advanced Move programming concepts with core language contributors. Learn about resource-oriented programming, formal verification, and more.
